articles.title: Video shows Ratchet & Clank PC port struggling to run on a PS4 HDD - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: The first impressions of the PC port of Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart have been posted.
articles.content:
The first impressions of the PC port of Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart have been published.
Respected hardware publication Digital Foundry has concluded that while the port is “impressive overall” … [+2467 chars]
